    def c24, 1, -1, 0, 2
    def c25, 0.5, 65280, 255, -32768
    def c26, 0.0078125, 0, 0, 0
    def c20, 1, 0, 0, 0
    def c21, 0, 1, 0, 0
    def c22, 0, 0, 1, 0

    dcl_position v0
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_texcoord o0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord1 o1
    dcl_texcoord6 o2
    dcl_texcoord7 o3
    dcl_position o4

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mul r0, c17.wwyy, v0.xyxy
    mad r1, r0.yxxy, c24.xxyy, c24.zzxx
    add r2, r1, r1
    add r0.x, v0.y, v0.x
    slt r0.x, c17.z, r0.x
    slt r0.y, v0.x, v0.y
    mad r0.x, r0.x, c24.w, r0.y
    mad r1, r1, -c24.w, c24.x
    mul r1, r1, c18
    mad r1, r2, c17.x, r1
    mova a0.x, r0.x
    dp4 r0.x, r1, c20[a0.x]
    frc r0.y, r0.x
    add r0.x, -r0.y, r0.x
    mov r1.x, c20.x
    if_lt c17.x, r1.x
      add r1.y, r0.y, -c16.x
      add r1.z, r0.x, c20.x
      mul r1.y, r1.z, r1.y
      add_sat r1.y, r1.y, r1.y

      mul_sat r1.y, r0.y, c16.y
    endif
    exp r0.y, -r0.x
    mad r2.xy, c19.x, r0.y, -r1.x
    add r0.y, -r0.x, -c20.x
    exp r0.y, r0.y
    mul r0.y, r0.y, c19.x
    max r0.y, r0.y, c24.w
    add r2.zw, r0.y, -c20.x
    mul r2, r2, c19.y
    mad r3, r0.zwzw, r2, c25.x
    frc r4, r3
    add r3, r3, -r4
    rcp r0.y, r2.y
    mul r2.xy, r0.y, r3
    mad r0.yz, r2.xxyw, c14.xxyw, c14.xzww
    mov r3.xy, c14
    mad r4.xy, r3, c25.x, r0.yzzw
    add r4.w, r0.x, -c16.z
    mov r4.z, c20.w
    texldl r0, r4, s0
    mul r0.xy, r0, c25.yzzw
    add r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
    add r0.x, r0.x, c25.w
    mul r2.z, r0.x, c26.x
    rcp r0.x, r2.w
    mul r0.xy, r0.x, r3.zwzw
    mad r1.xz, r0.xyyw, c14.xyyw, c14.zyww
    mad r5.xy, r3, c25.x, r1.xzzw
    add r5.zw, r4, c20.xyyx
    texldl r4, r5, s0
    mul r1.xz, r4.xyyw, c25.yyzw
    add r0.w, r1.z, r1.x
    add r0.w, r0.w, c25.w
    mul r0.z, r0.w, c26.x
    lrp r4.xyz, r1.y, r0, r2
    mul r0, r4.y, c7
    mad r0, c6, r4.x, r0
    mad r0, c8, r4.z, r0
    add r0, r0, c9
    mul r1, r0.y, c1
    mad r1, c0, r0.x, r1
    mad r1, c2, r0.z, r1
    mad r1, c3, r0.w, r1
    mul r0.w, r1.w, c13.z

    add o0.xy, r4, c19.zwzw
    mad o1.zw, r4.xyxy, c15.xyxy, c15
    mad r2.xy, r4, c14, c14.zwzw
    mad o1.xy, r3, c25.x, r2
    mad r0.xyz, r0, -c4.w, c4
    mul r2.xyz, r0.y, c11
    mad r0.xyw, c10.xyzz, r0.x, r2.xyzz

mad r1.x, r31.w, r31.x, r1.x

    mov o2, r1
    mov o3.w, c20.x
